statements: SELECT * FROM ProteinHistory WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT modification_type, modification_date FROM ProteinHistory WHERE modification_description LIKE '%phosphorylation%';
SELECT modification_description FROM ProteinHistory WHERE modification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ProteinHistory ORDER BY modification_date ASC, modification_type DESC;
SELECT protein_id, COUNT(protein_id) AS total_modifications FROM ProteinHistory GROUP BY protein_id HAVING total_modifications > 2;
SELECT protein_id, modification_type, modification_date FROM ProteinHistory WHERE protein_id = 100 ORDER BY modification_date DESC;
SELECT protein_id, modification_type, modification_date, modification_description FROM ProteinHistory WHERE modification_type = 'Phosphorylation' ORDER BY protein_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinHistory WHERE post_translational_change IN ('Acetylation', 'Methylation') ORDER BY modification_date DESC;

SELECT protein_id, modification_type, modification_date, modification_description, post_translational_change FROM ProteinHistory WHERE modification_type LIKE '%ylation' ORDER BY modification_type ASC, protein_id DESC;

SELECT protein_id, post_translational_change, COUNT(*) AS modification_count FROM ProteinHistory GROUP BY protein_id, post_translational_change HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY modification_count DESC, protein_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Modifications LIMIT 5;
SELECT modification_id, modification_name, modification_type FROM Modifications WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PostTranslationalChanges WHERE change_type = 'Acetylation';
SELECT ptc_id, protein_id, change_date FROM PostTranslationalChanges ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT modification_name, modification_date FROM Modifications WHERE modification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT modification_name, protein_id FROM Modifications WHERE modification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY protein_id DESC, modification_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT protein_id, modification_type, modification_date FROM Modifications WHERE modification_type = 'Phosphorylation' ORDER BY modification_date DESC;
SELECT protein_id, change_type, change_description FROM PostTranslationalChanges WHERE protein_id = 1001 AND change_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY change_type ASC, change_description ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT modification_name, modification_type FROM Modifications WHERE modification_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) ORDER BY modification_name ASC, modification_type DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT protein_id, change_type, change_date FROM PostTranslationalChanges WHERE change_type LIKE '%glycosylation%' ORDER BY change_date ASC, protein_id DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM protein_modifications;
SELECT protein_id, modification_type FROM protein_modifications WHERE modification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_modifications FROM protein_modifications;
SELECT structure_id, structure_description FROM protein_structure ORDER BY structure_id DESC;
SELECT protein_id, modification_id, structure_id, modification_date FROM protein_history WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM protein_modifications WHERE protein_id = 1 ORDER BY modification_date DESC;
SELECT protein_id, COUNT(modification_id) AS total_modifications FROM protein_history GROUP BY protein_id;
SELECT structure_id, structure_description FROM protein_structure WHERE structure_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM protein_modifications WHERE modification_type LIKE 'phosphorylation%' ORDER BY modification_date ASC;
SELECT protein_id, COUNT(DISTINCT structure_id) AS total_structures FROM protein_history GROUP BY protein_id HAVING total_structures >= 2;
SELECT * FROM protein_modifications ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT id, modification_type FROM protein_modifications WHERE modification_type = 'Phosphorylation';
SELECT protein_name, modification_description FROM protein_modifications WHERE modification_type = 'Acetylation' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT protein_id, change_type FROM post_translational_changes WHERE change_description LIKE '%structural%';
SELECT * FROM modification_history ORDER BY modification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM protein_modifications WHERE modification_type = 'Phosphorylation';
SELECT protein_name, modification_type FROM protein_modifications WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY modification_type DESC;
SELECT protein_name, modification_description FROM protein_modifications WHERE modification_description LIKE '%kinase%';
SELECT protein_name, modification_type FROM protein_modifications WHERE protein_name = 'AKT1' AND modification_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT protein_name, modification_description FROM protein_modifications WHERE modification_type = 'Acetylation' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id = 3;
SELECT modification_id, modification_type, modification_description FROM Modifications ORDER BY modification_id DESC;
SELECT change_id, change_type, change_description FROM PostTranslationalChanges WHERE change_type = 'Phosphorylation';
SELECT history_id, modification_id, modified_by, modification_date FROM ModificationHistory WHERE modified_by LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY modification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id = 3;
SELECT modification_type, modification_location FROM Modifications WHERE modification_id = 10;
SELECT modification_description, modification_date FROM Modifications JOIN ModificationHistory ON Modifications.modification_id = ModificationHistory.modification_id WHERE modified_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT change_type, change_description FROM PostTranslationalChanges WHERE change_id IN (SELECT change_id FROM PTCHistory WHERE changed_by = 'Alice Smith');
